primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God vindicates the suffering of the oppressed through the pattern of the Passion and Resurrection, transforming local struggle into a global catalyst for conscience.

tekstueel_bewijs: God will bring to pass what he has begun
the reversal of all the world's verdicts
the vindication of the sanity of the universe

zender.identificatie: God's Providence / The Moral Arc of the Universe
tekstueel_bewijs: There is a God who rules above
As surely as God lives, his way must triumph
Montgomery has become a central item on the prayer agenda
God will not leave our souls in hell
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer identifies as the Receiver of God's vindication but also as a Co-Subject through 'commitment'.

tekstueel_bewijs: through God's providence and by your commitment
Your gallantry and your faith... have staved off violence
helper.rol_van_god: God is the primary Subject, but human 'commitment' is the necessary Helper.

tekstueel_bewijs: all the libels that wickedness can impose
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not just social policy but 'the claims of evil' and 'hell' itself.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The community's struggle (The Cross) as a means to sensitize the world's conscience.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Hearers ('You')
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The human struggle in Montgomery is framed as a participation in the primary narrative of Christ's Calvary.

voorbeelden_god_subject: God will bring to pass what he has begun
He which hath begun a good work in you will perform it
voorbeelden_mens_subject: You wait for the resurrection faith
If I am right, he'll fight my battle

voorbeelden: Men and women who want to love the Lord must have asked themselves
Men and women who want to love the Lord
rooms of which you know not
annulment of all claims of evil

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on God's 'Power to do' (Pouvoir) which overrides the world's 'Power to oppress'. It is a sermon of empowerment through divine agency.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: Moves from the 'Silent Hill' (S2) through the 'Anguished Waiting' (~S1) to the 'Coronation' (S1).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The Resurrection is the 'reversal' of the world's logic, moving the Subject from the domain of S2 to S1.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High. The 'night', 'hell', and 'wickedness' are treated as formidable realities.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: While there is a strong call to 'commitment', the engine of the sermon is theocentric. God is the one who performs the work, fights the battle, and reverses the verdicts.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: If I am right, he'll fight my battle.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: He which hath begun a good work in you will perform it.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: The hearers' struggle is mapped onto Christ's Calvary, but Christ is the Victor, not just a model.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: N/A - The sermon already leans heavily on God's action.

identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Soteriology is linked to social liberation (Exodus/Resurrection motif).

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The integration of the Montgomery struggle into the cosmic drama of Christ is seamless.
spanning_punten: The tension between 'God's providence' and 'your commitment' as joint causes for change.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: Christ leads captivity captive and puts to rout the armies of the aliens.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The 'good work' is performed by God, implying an external endowment of perseverance.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is seen as 'wickedness' and 'claims of evil' that require a divine annulment.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon successfully positions God as the primary Subject of the 'Resurrection' narrative, while the hearers are the Receivers of vindication.

identificatie_herstel.problematische_identificatie: The phrase 'If I am right' introduces a legalistic conditionality.
identificatie_herstel.voorgestelde_identificatie: The hearer as one who is 'righted' by God rather than one who must 'be right' to earn God's help.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Shift from 'If I am right' to 'Because He is righteous'.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain, but perhaps clarify the 'Savoir' (How the Spirit works internally).
modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Explicitly mention the Holy Spirit as the Helper.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: The opponent is already cosmic and serious.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: Soteriology (God's victory) clearly grounds the Ethics (the community's endurance).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A powerful example of theocentric preaching that uses the narrative of the Passion to interpret contemporary suffering without falling into mere moralism.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorical analysis would focus on the 'I shall have peace' climax; Greimas shows that 'God' is the actant who produces that peace.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis would look at the context of Philippians; Greimas looks at how the 'Good Work' functions as a mandate in the sermon's story.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'World's Conscience' is an Object being acted upon by God through the 'Cross' of the Montgomery community.

appendices.notities: The sermon uses a 'Participationist' logic where the human story is swallowed by the Divine story.
